subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph:
As an Indiana prep star in 2000, the Blazers' Zach Randolph was a favorite to win the title of Mr. Basketball, but he finished second to Jared Jeffries, now of the Knicks.

He finished a distant second to Jared Jeffries
